mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_spec(good_id, no, price, line_price, stock_num, sales, weight, store_id, add_time, update_time) VALUES(#{goodId}, #{no}, #{price}, #{linePrice}, #{stockNum}, 0, #{weight}, #{storeId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE goods_spec SET no=#{no}, price=#{price}, line_price=#{linePrice}, stock_num=#{stockNum}, weight=#{weight}, update_time=NOW() WHERE good_id=#{goodId} AND store_id=#{storeId}
